mapper.insert: insert into sku (spu_id, size, color, feature1, feature2, feature3, count) VALUES (#{spuId}, #{size}, #{color}, #{feature1}, #{feature2}, #{feature3}, #{count})

insert into sku ( spu_id, size, color, feature1, feature2, feature3, count ) values
( #{good.spuId}, #{good.size}, #{good.color}, #{good.feature1}, #{good.feature2}, #{good.feature3}, #{good.count} )
mapper.select: select p.spu_id, k.sku_id, p.spu_name, p.sale_price, p.type, g.type_name, k.size, k.color, k.feature1, k.feature2, k.feature3 from spu p,sku k,goods_type g where p.spu_id = k.spu_id and p.type = g.id and p.is_deleted = 0 and k.is_deleted = 0 and p.spu_id = #{spuId}
